attributes.action: to simplify the Blue Badge system, and that it is correctly poiliced
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We want the Blue Badge Scheme to be run the same way across the country, so that all disabled people know how it is run everywhere - and will not get caught out. Also, make sure that local councils and supermarkets, not only supply the correct number of spaces but also correctly enforce the scheme so that those who do not have a blue badge, park in these places.
